hasMenuItem.description: Motichoor ladoo consists of tiny, fried gram flour pearls soaked in sugar syrup, often garnished with cardamom and nuts, forming round, sweet balls.

hasMenuItem.description: A traditional sweet, typically made with ground cashews, sugar, and cardamom, often finished with a thin layer of edible silver leaf.

hasMenuItem.description: A traditional Indian sweet made by condensing milk and sugar, often garnished with nuts for a rich and grainy texture.

hasMenuItem.description: Soft, deep-fried milk-based dough balls soaked in fragrant sugar syrup.

hasMenuItem.name: Kajoo Roll
hasMenuItem.description: Kajoo roll is a sweet delicacy made from finely ground cashews, shaped into rolls, and often includes pistachios for added texture and flavor.

hasMenuItem.name: Regular Ladoo
hasMenuItem.description: Spherical sweets made from flour, ghee, and sugar, often enhanced with cardamom or nuts for added flavor.

hasMenuItem.name: Malai Jamun

hasMenuItem.name: Badana
hasMenuItem.description: Boondi, a traditional Indian sweet, typically consists of tiny, deep-fried gram flour balls, soaked in a sweet, fragrant syrup.

review.reviewBody: great food and a great price!! their chana bhatura is to die for and the samosa were 10/10
No other store makes Kalakand as they do. Best in town!!
Ordering since 2017 nothing else to add
Chana bhatura is great but too much oily and sometime the sizes are shrunk lol . Gulabjamun is great
Samosa and Laddoo were good Jalebis are not upto the mark
